Resilient Systems REST API: LayoutViewItemDTO

LayoutViewItemDTO Data Type

Represents an item inside a view.

Properties
name data type description
step_label string The step label (if applicable).
fields array of LayoutViewItemDTO The list of fields in the view.
show_if array of LayoutViewConditionDTO List of conditions that must be true in order to show the view (applicable only for items with an "element" property value of "section").
element string Gets the element. This can be one of:
  • field - the item is a field reference. The field name is stored in the content property.
  • html - the item is an HTML block. The HTML content is stored in the content property.
  • header - the item is a header. The header text is stored in the content property.
  • section - the item is a section. The content property is ignored. The list of sub-items is stored in the "fields" property.
  • tab - the item is a tab. The content property is ignored. The list of sub-items (sections, fields, etc.) is stored in the "fields" property.
field_type string The type of object to which this view item applies. Currently, the following values are supported:
  • incident
  • actioninvocation
content string The content for the item. The value here depends on the element property (see the list of possible element property values).
predefined_uuid string Some of the items are "predefined" by the server. We give them a well-known UUID so users can reset back to the known state.
show_link_header boolean Link header should be displayed or not. This property is for UI side use only

Example

{
  "step_label" : "...",
  "fields" : [ {
    "step_label" : "...",
    "fields" : [ { }, { } ],
    "show_if" : [ {
      "condition" : "...",
      "field" : "...",
      "value" : { }
    }, {
      "condition" : "...",
      "field" : "...",
      "value" : { }
    } ],
    "element" : "...",
    "field_type" : "...",
    "content" : "...",
    "predefined_uuid" : "...",
    "show_link_header" : true
  }, {
    "step_label" : "...",
    "fields" : [ { }, { } ],
    "show_if" : [ {
      "condition" : "...",
      "field" : "...",
      "value" : { }
    }, {
      "condition" : "...",
      "field" : "...",
      "value" : { }
    } ],
    "element" : "...",
    "field_type" : "...",
    "content" : "...",
    "predefined_uuid" : "...",
    "show_link_header" : true
  } ],
  "show_if" : [ {
    "condition" : "...",
    "field" : "...",
    "value" : { }
  }, {
    "condition" : "...",
    "field" : "...",
    "value" : { }
  } ],
  "element" : "...",
  "field_type" : "...",
  "content" : "...",
  "predefined_uuid" : "...",
  "show_link_header" : true
}
